title: Lots of new items
body:
These might not be balanced but pls suggest what i could change.

1. The Opposite of sunfire cape: Coat of Midnight
HP 400
MR 45
Passive: Shadow's Cape
Upon taking Magic Damage, Gains a barrier that decreases incoming magic damage by 12% for 12 seconds.
40 or maybe 35 second cooldown.

Cost should be around 2700-3000g

2.  Orb of Life
HP 700

Unique Passive: Rejuvenation
Increases base health regen by 200%. As well as healing a bonus 1% Max hp every second whether taking damage or not.
However every 3seconds in combat the Max HP regen is increased by 1%. Up to 10% Max hp every second.

Should cost 3200g or more.


3.  Poisonous Dagger
Attack range +10
AD 40
Atk Speed 40%

Passive: Slow Poison
Enemies hit by auto attacks take a bonus 4+Lvlx2 Physical Damage every second. As well as being slowed by 8% for the duration of 5 seconds.

Should Cost around 1600--2400g


5.  Jet Pack
Now i know this seems stupid but it actually is pretty good if it exists.

Armor+30
MR+30
Movement Speed +25

UNIQUE Active: Flies up into the air for 10 seconds, becoming invulnerable to melee attacks but not ranged and projectiles.
In Air can fly past terrain,  and gains 15% Movement Speed. However moving leaves a smoke trail for 5 seconds. Enemies can see this trail regardless of whether they can see him or not. 
Has a 45 second cooldown.

Should upgrade from boot but should not be a boot item.
Should cost in total 1700---2500g

6.  Another upgrade for the Basic Boot: Travellers Boots
Gains 40 Movement speed

Active: Gains 25/30/35/40  movement speed on levels 1/6/11/16  for 20 seconds, ignores unit collision and the bonus movement speed is NOT effected by slows.


7. The Axe of the Fallen
Attack Speed +35%
AD 60
Armor Penetration + 10%
Armor penetration + 10 

Passive: The Champion that last attacked you is titled "The Enemy", Attacking them causes them to take 3% Of their Max HP as Bonus TD. Can only effect one champion at a time and does not proc on Auto Aim Skill shots, Such as Kassadin's q Null Sphere, Veigars ult Primordial Burst or 
Akali's Q and R.  each Champion may only be effected once every 10 seconds.  Ranged attacks deal only 2% of max hp and has a 20 second cooldown instead of 10 seconds.

These are my ideas so far. If any of them are way too broken pls let me know.
